content:
Hi, I'm here at DevDays2019 and I would like to share a security model that we have implemented for ditributing a FHIR API to a trusted third party, something that simulates the work of a SAML assertion and is freely inspired to JWT.
If someone has faced or is going to face the same problematic, I would like to discuss about it.

I am not at DevDays, but am co-chair of the HL7 Security WG. We would love to hear your proposal. Do you have anything written that we can review? We are glad to promote various security models on the security pages of the FHIR core.
Thanks for your answer John, I will try to post here a description next days.
better to post it to the #Security and Privacy stream
